column2: Duelist Training
You can retire from your life as a ruler for a month to train your combat skills.
You have completed your month of training and have made some small progress on your duelling skills.
Good.
You have completed your months of studying and have improved your education significantly.
Excellent.
You have completed your months of studying and failed to improve your education, you dullard.
Fuck.
You have completed your months of studying and failed to improve your education, you dullard.
Fuck.
Your spies have successfully stolen the secrets of gun manufacturing from the british and have returned to teach your smiths in the ways of firearm production.
Excellent!
Your spies have failed to steal the secrets of gun manufacturing from the british and were caught in the act security has been significantly tightened.
Damn our last chance!
Improve My Education
Send My Child to University
You can send your child to university to improve their talents in their area of expertise..
You can retire from your life as a ruler for a few months to study in your area of expertise.
You have completed your month of training and have made some progress on your duelling skills.
Good.
You have completed your month of training and have made moderate progress on your duelling skills.
Great.
You have completed your month of training and have made no progress on your duelling skills while also injuring yourself.
Unfortunate!.
You have completed your month of training and have made some great progress on your duelling skills.
Excellent.
You have completed your month of training and have made massive strides on your duelling skills.
Wonderful.
You have completed your month of training and can now be considered a fully fledged duelist, though additional training won't hurt your skills.
Amazing.
